summary.span: 为移动 XHTML 适配器集提供对象列表适配器。

span.span: Provides an object list adapter for the mobile XHTML adapter set.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (ASP.NET 移动应用和网站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件开发人员可以使用类 在新设备上或针对新的标记标准显示控件。The class can be used by mobile control developers to display an control on new devices or for new markup standards. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [控制和适配器交互](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/04b7t6fs(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Control and Adapter Interaction](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/04b7t6fs(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的默认实现 调用 相应控件适配器的方法，而该方法又可以回调 控件的方法或 方法，或者创建自己的特定于设备的模板化 UI。The default implementation of the method calls the method of the corresponding control adapter, which in turn can either call back the method or the method for the control, or create its own device-specific templated UI.

returns.span: 如果处理过此事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the event was handled; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在接收回发事件通知时由控件调用，以检查事件是否特定于适配器。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter-specific. 如果控件实现 方法并接收回发事件，则 会调用控件适配器的方法。If the control implements the method and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果发送到控件的事件可能因目标设备而异，则此方法的控件实现必须调用 控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回 `true` 或 `false` ，指示设备适配器是否已处理事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. `false`默认情况下，它返回。It returns `false` by default.

span.span: the postback data is invalid.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述

span.span: A string constant used in postback event arguments to indicate that the browser should jump to a specific item in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 字段是一个内部字段，其值为 "__more*n*"，其中 `n` 是一个数字，在呈现过程中创建。The field, which is an internal field and has the value "__more*n*", where `n` is a number, is created during rendering. 除了指定要在详细信息视图中显示的项的索引外，此字段的使用方式与字段类似。This field is used like the field, except that it specifies the index of the item to display in details view. 此 字段由移动控件开发人员使用。The field is used by mobile control developers.

related.span: 自适应控制行为的体系结构概述
